Ogre::PagingLandScapeListener

Ogre::PagingLandScapeListener Class Reference

#include <OgrePagingLandScapeListener.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Abstract class which classes can override to receive notifications when a page is ready to be added to the terrain manager.

Definition at line 33 of file OgrePagingLandScapeListener.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Ogre::PagingLandScapeListener::pagePreloaded ( const size_t  pagex,
const size_t  pagez,
const Real *  heightData,
const AxisAlignedBox &  Bbox 
) [inline, virtual]

Listener method called when a new page is about to be constructed.

Parameters:
pagex,pagez The index of the page being constructed
heightData Array of normalised height data (0..1). The size of this buffer will conform to the scene manager page size. The listener may modify the data if it wishes.
